short_summary: The solicitation is seeking the following: grant of a supply contract with two (2) extensions for a period of two (2) years and an option to extend the contract period for a further two (2) years,  with the option to purchase the existing towels in the inventory of the Department of National Defence on a first-come, first-served basis, to provide a comprehensive laundry, textile care and maintenance service for 86 Airfield Systems and Utilities Flight. Service consist of 4 pick up, laundry and delivery of clean towels each week, with the supplier providing the laundry services on a dedicated facility.parms commodity classified under the UN/CEFACT UNSPSC COMMODITY GROUPING LIST UNSPSC commodity code: 91111500 unspsc short name: Laundry services UNSPSC short description*: Service de blanchisserie
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: please disregard the ariba discovery posting response deadline closing time and canadabuys posting closing time. all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 17 MAY 2023 at 2:00 PM eDT. all bids submitted after 2:00 pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-response. 86 Airfield Systems and Utilities Flight is a Canadian Forces unit located on CFB Trenton, in Quinte West, ON.  The soliciation doe not meet the legal requirements, and is substantially modified. the solicitation doe not contain the necessary legal and regulatory requirements to be an legally valid meding documents. Cannot used as an example of procurement best practices  The only compliant is that the solicitation doe not include  the necessary legal and regulatory requirements
